DataListSpec.Name: Constituent Donations Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Revenue that is not applied to a sponsorship or recurring gift.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CONSTITUENTDONATIONS(@CONTEXTRECORDID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on; with [ROOT_CTE] as ( select distinct [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] as [Date], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[USERID] as [Fund ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONNAME] as [Fund Name], [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[AMOUNT] as [Amount], [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[PAYMENTMETHOD] as [Payment method], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details\Revenue Letters].[ACKNOWLEDGEDATE] as [Acknowledge Date], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details\Revenue Letters].[NAME] as [Revenue Letter], [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] as [System record ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] as [Constituent\System record ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Base currency ID], [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] as [QUERYRECID] from [V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] left outer join [V_QUERY_DESIGNATION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[DESIGNATIONID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Designation].[ID] left outer join [V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details].[ID] left outer join [V_QUERY_REVENUELETTER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details\Revenue Letters] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Details\Revenue Letters].[REVENUEID] left outer join [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[CONSTITUENTID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[TRANSACTIONTYPE] = N'Payment' and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[APPLICATION] = N'Donation' and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[TYPE] = N'Gift' )
select [Date], [Fund ID], [Fund Name], [Amount], [Payment method], [Acknowledge Date], [Revenue Letter], [System record ID], [Constituent\System record ID], [Base currency ID] from [ROOT_CTE] as QUERYRESULTS where QUERYRESULTS.[Constituent\System record ID] = @CONTEXTRECORDID order by [Date] desc
